LOGIN_SCREEN.NO_ACCOUNT: Don't have an account? Sign up

RECOVERY_PASS_SCREEN.INPUT_EMAIL: For your security, enter the e-mail registered to reset your password
RECOVERY_PASS_SCREEN.SUCCESS: A password recovery code has been sent to your e-mail.
RECOVERY_PASS_SCREEN.TYPE_THE_CODE: Enter the code entered in your registered e-mail. The code is valid for 10 minutes and must be used 1x.
RECOVERY_PASS_SCREEN.PASSWORD_REQUIREMENTS: For your security, the password must contain at least:
RECOVERY_PASS_SCREEN.SUCCESS_ALTER_PASS: Your password has been changed successfully

CREATE_ACCOUNT_SCREEN.NAME: Name
CREATE_ACCOUNT_SCREEN.PASSWORD_REQUIREMENTS: For your security, the password must contain at least:
CREATE_ACCOUNT_SCREEN.SUCCESS_CREATE_ACCOUNT: Your Horusec account has been successfully created!
CREATE_ACCOUNT_SCREEN.SUCCESS_CREATE_ACCOUNT_WITH_CONFIRM: An e-mail has been sent to verify your account.

WORKSPACES_SCREEN.TITLE: Workspace management
WORKSPACES_SCREEN.CONFIRM_DELETE: Do you really want to delete this workspace? This action cannot be undone.
WORKSPACES_SCREEN.TYPE_WORKSPACE_NAME: Enter the name of the workspace below:
WORKSPACES_SCREEN.NO_TOKENS: There are no registered tokens for this workspace.
WORKSPACES_SCREEN.CONFIRM_DELETE_TOKEN: Do you really want to delete this token? This action cannot be undone.
WORKSPACES_SCREEN.TOKEN_INFO: With the token, you access analyzes for the selected repository. Save in a safe place and don't share.
WORKSPACES_SCREEN.REFERENCE_GROUP: Identify your user group, for the following Horusec groups:

USERS.TITLE: Users of Workspace
USERS.CONFIRM_DELETE: Do you really want remove this user of workspace?

TABLE.EMPTY: There are no matching users for this workspace

REPOSITORIES_SCREEN.TITLE: Repositories
REPOSITORIES_SCREEN.NAME: Name
REPOSITORIES_SCREEN.NO_REPOSITORIES: There are no corresponding repositories for this workspace.
REPOSITORIES_SCREEN.CONFIRM_DELETE_REPO: Do you really want to delete the repository? This action cannot be undone.
REPOSITORIES_SCREEN.NO_USERS_TO_INVITE: There are no matching users to be invited.
REPOSITORIES_SCREEN.NO_TOKENS: There are no registered tokens for this repository.
REPOSITORIES_SCREEN.CONFIRM_DELETE_TOKEN: Do you really want to delete this token? This action cannot be undone.
REPOSITORIES_SCREEN.CREATE_TOKEN_BELOW: Enter the description for the new token:
REPOSITORIES_SCREEN.TOKEN_INFO: With the token, you access analyzes for the selected repository. Save in a safe place and don't share.
REPOSITORIES_SCREEN.SUCCESS_ADD_USER: Success in adding user to the repository!
REPOSITORIES_SCREEN.SUCCESS_REMOVE_USER: User removed from the repository successfully!
REPOSITORIES_SCREEN.REFERENCE_GROUP: Identify your user group, for the following Horusec groups:

RULES.HANDLER: You have access to view/edit/remove the repository.
RULES.HANDLER_TOKENS: Has access to view/edit/remove access tokens to the repository.
RULES.HANDLER_USER: Has access to view/create/edit/remove user access to the repository.
RULES.ANALYTIC_REPO: You have access to view the repository graphics.
RULES.VULNERABILITIES_VIEW: You only have access to the repository view on the Vulnerabilities screen.
RULES.VULNERABILITIES_HANDLE: Has access to view/manage the repository on the Vulnerabilities screen.

RULES.HANDLER: You have access to edit/remove the company.
RULES.HANDLER_USER: Has access to view/invite/edit/remove users within the company.
RULES.CREATE: You have access to create new repositories.
RULES.ANALYTIC_COMPANY: You have access to view the company's graphics.
RULES.ANALYTIC_REPO: Has access to view the graphics of the repository that he has access to.

TABLE.EMPTY: There are no vulnerabilities for this repository

WEBHOOK_SCREEN.TITLE: Webhooks
WEBHOOK_SCREEN.DESCRIPTION_LABEL: Enter the description for the webhook:
WEBHOOK_SCREEN.RESPOSITORY_LABEL: Select the repository that will trigger the webhook:
WEBHOOK_SCREEN.URL_LABEL: Insert the endpoint (url) to be triggered by Horusec:
WEBHOOK_SCREEN.ALREADY_TO_REPOSITORY: Already exists webhook to repository selected.
WEBHOOK_SCREEN.CONFIRM_DELETE: Do you really want to delete this webhook? This action cannot be undone.

SETTINGS_SCREEN.TITLE: Account configurations
SETTINGS_SCREEN.CONFIRM_DELETE: Do you really want to delete your account This action cannot be undone.
SETTINGS_SCREEN.NAME: Username
SETTINGS_SCREEN.SUCCESS_UPDATE: A request to verify the new email has been sent to your email.
SETTINGS_SCREEN.SUCCESS_DELETE: Your account has been successfully deleted!

API_ERRORS.ERROR_LOGIN: Check your e-mail and password and try again.
API_ERRORS.UNCONFIRMED_EMAIL: The e-mail has not yet been confirmed.
API_ERRORS.EMAIL_IN_USE: The informed e-mail is already in use.
API_ERRORS.NO_RECORDS: There are no corresponding records for the reported data.
API_ERRORS.ALREADY_IN_COMPANY: This user is already part of this workspace.
API_ERRORS.PRIVILEGES: You do not have sufficient permissions to perform this action.
API_ERRORS.SAME_PASSWORD: The new password cannot be the same as the current one.
API_ERRORS.EMPTY_REPOSITORY: Please select a repository to view the data.
API_ERRORS.LDAP_GROUP: The user group must be valid for this user.
